bibl.title: Greek Painted Pottery in Egypt: Evidence of Contacts in the Seventh and Sixth Centuries BC.
Moving Across Borders. Foreign Relations, Religion and Cultural Interactions in the Ancient Mediterranean

bibl.note: Introduction. - Local Imitations. - Greek painted pottery in Egyptian context. - Conclusions.
WEBER Sabine, Greek Painted Pottery in Egypt: Evidence of Contacts in the Seventh and Sixth Centuries BC.
